title: You’ve Got Murder
description: Artificial Intelligence Personality Turing Hopper is in a panic. Her creator, Zack, has missed work for several days. After exhausting her resources, Turing is still far from giving up. For, unlike other AIPs, Turing is sentient—and she senses foul play. Her skills of deduction may be virtually flawless. But it’ll take more than that for a digital detective to catch a flesh-and-blood criminal …
author: Donna Andrews
